mapper.sql: id, header, nick_name, tel, success_count, transfer_count, search_area_count, quit_time, collect_count, browse_count, total_fee,gender,open_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from client
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into client (id, header, nick_name, tel, success_count, transfer_count, search_area_count, quit_time, collect_count, browse_count, total_fee,gender,open_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{header,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{successCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transferCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{searchAreaCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{collectCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{browseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalFee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into client
id,
header,
nick_name,
tel,
success_count,
transfer_count,
search_area_count,
quit_time,
collect_count,
browse_count,
total_fee,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{header,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{successCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{transferCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{searchAreaCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{quitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{collectCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{browseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{totalFee,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update client
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
header = #{record.header,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{record.nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{record.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
success_count = #{record.successCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
transfer_count = #{record.transferCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
search_area_count = #{record.searchAreaCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quit_time = #{record.quitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
collect_count = #{record.collectCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
browse_count = #{record.browseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_fee = #{record.totalFee,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update client set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, header = #{record.header,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{record.nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{record.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, success_count = #{record.successCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transfer_count = #{record.transferCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, search_area_count = #{record.searchAreaCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quit_time = #{record.quitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, collect_count = #{record.collectCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, browse_count = #{record.browseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_fee = #{record.totalFee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gender = #{record.gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_id = #{record.openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update client
header = #{header,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
success_count = #{successCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
transfer_count = #{transferCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
search_area_count = #{searchAreaCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quit_time = #{quitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
collect_count = #{collectCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
browse_count = #{browseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_fee = #{totalFee,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update client set header = #{header,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, success_count = #{successCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transfer_count = #{transferCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, search_area_count = #{searchAreaCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quit_time = #{quitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, collect_count = #{collectCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, browse_count = #{browseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_fee = #{totalFee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
